mapper.select: SELECT u.*, p.picture_type pictureType, p.picture_url pictureUrl, p.pser_id pserId , p.id pictureId FROM ybd_user u, ybd_picture p WHERE p.pser_id = u.id and phone=#{phone} and password=#{password}
SELECT u.*, p.picture_type pictureType, p.picture_url pictureUrl, p.pser_id pserId , p.id pictureId FROM ybd_user u, ybd_picture p WHERE p.pser_id = u.id and u.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update ybd_user set user_name=#{userName},sex=#{sex} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT q.*,p.picture_url from ybd_picture p RIGHT JOIN (SELECT ybd_user.id,ybd_user.user_name, COUNT(ybd_question_back.game_level_id) as questionNum from ybd_user LEFT JOIN ybd_user_answer_record on ybd_user.id=ybd_user_answer_record.user_id LEFT JOIN ybd_question_back on ybd_question_back.game_level_id=ybd_user_answer_record.chapter_serial_number GROUP BY ybd_user.id ORDER BY questionNum desc) q on p.pser_id = q.id and p.picture_type='head' ORDER BY questionNum desc limit 10

SELECT q.*,p.picture_url from ybd_picture p RIGHT JOIN (select ybd_user.id,ybd_user.user_name, CAST(ybd_answer_number_question_by_user.correct_count_number/ ybd_answer_number_question_by_user.cumulative_count_number * 100 AS decimal(9,2)) as answerRate from ybd_user LEFT JOIN ybd_answer_number_question_by_user on ybd_answer_number_question_by_user.user_id=ybd_user.id order by answerRate desc) q on p.pser_id = q.id and p.picture_type='head' ORDER BY answerRate desc limit 10
mapper.delete: delete from ybd_picture where picture_type='head' and pser_id=#{id}
mapper.update: update ybd_user set phone=#{newPhone} where id=#{id}
update ybd_user set password=#{password} where phone=#{phone}
